document_data.name: Saj Amog
document_data.mainbody: '''Saj Amog''' was a [[lich]] and the [[Zulkir]] of [[Conjuration]] in [[Thay]] in the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: As a zulkir, Amog was a member of the ruling council of Thay. He was also an ally of [[Valindra Shadowmantle]].
document_data.History: After many defeats in [[Neverwinter]] and busy with crushing the rebels of the [[Thayan Resurrection]], Zulkir Saj Amog was sent from [[Thay]] to help Valindra Shadowmantle in her schemes. Amog led a Thayan army to recapture the [[Dread Ring (Neverwinter Wood)|Dread Ring]] but was defeated by an adventurer.<ref>
